Popup.Text: Hey, you there! Yeah, you with the weapon. Mind giving me a hand here?
These slimy critters just won't quit. Thought I could snag some mushrooms for the village, not become slime fodder.
I take it you're just passing through, looking for a quick coin or some adventure? Like a wandering hero from those old tales...
But there's something about the way you fight. It's calculated.
I somehow feel you've faced worse than slimes.
I've got your back, let's get through this mess.
You're not half bad at this. Not many folks would jump into a slime den without a second thought.
Oh, look who's trying to be the king of slimes! Not on my watch!
Oh sorry was that your friend? Don't worry, you're next!
Slime your way out of this!
Dicing slimes like onions in the kitchen!
Nice try, but I've seen scarier jelly at the dessert table!
